sentences.en: Don't bend or kneel next to fireworks once you light them.
sentences.cn: 点燃烟花时不要弯腰或跪在烟花旁。

sentences.en: It seemed as though he dared not kneel directly before God.
sentences.cn: 他似乎不敢直接向上帝下跪。

sentences.en: You can squat rather than kneel to lift an object from the floor.
sentences.cn: 你可以蹲着而不是跪着把一个物体从地板上抬起来。
